product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This square promotional banner is visually divided into four quadrants using soft pink hues. The top-left quadrant features bold typographic elements, with two stacked heading layers ("heading_1" and "heading_2") in a strong sans serif font and a subheading ("subheading") beneath in a classic serif typeface. The top-right showcases an image of rose gold earrings ("product_image"), accentuated with surrounding minimal decor.

Bottom-left houses a bulleted text list ("description") conveying product quality and features, while the bottom-right quadrant focuses on pricing ("price"), a feminine tagline ("tagline"), and a prominent call-to-action button ("cta_background" with button text "cta").

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink (#F8E8EE)
- Rose Pink (#E7A9BC)
- Deep Rose (#D27D9C)
- Plum (#9A4C6C)
- Off-white (#FDF4F5)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features elegant earrings with a delicate color palette centered around rose gold (#F4A8A6), soft blush pink (#F7C6C0), and sparkling diamond white (#FFFFFF) tones. The rose gold forms the structural base, creating a warm metallic contrast that enhances the softness of the blush pink element, shaped like a petal. The clear white stones are strategically placed, reflecting light with brilliance and further highlighting the product's premium aesthetic. Together, these colors blend harmoniously yet remain individually distinguishable. For an advertisement banner, these colors can be used on a soft pastel background, with complementary gold and pink gradients to convey luxury and elegance.
